sections.title: Overview
sections.content: This guide covers setting up REVLib for SPARK MAX, SPARK Flex, and NEO motors.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
1. VS Code: Command Palette → "WPILib: Manage Vendor Libraries" → "Install new (online)".
2. URL: https://software-metadata.revrobotics.com/REVLib-2025.json

sections.title: REV Hardware Client
sections.content: Download REV Hardware Client to configure CAN IDs, update firmware, and test motors via USB.
